testCases.label: FoodProduct extends Product
testCases.description: Reads the FoodProduct class definition from src/main/java/index.js and asserts that the text contains 'FoodProduct extends Product', ensuring FoodProduct is a subclass of Product.

testCases.label: FoodProduct has expirationDate state
testCases.description: Asserts that the FoodProduct class text contains the private field '#expirationDate', verifying that the expirationDate state is defined.

testCases.label: FoodProduct constructor and parameters
testCases.description: Checks that the FoodProduct class text includes the constructor name 'FoodProduct' and parameters 'name', 'description', and 'expirationDate', and that the constructor assigns 'this.#expirationDate'.

testCases.label: FoodProduct getters and setters
testCases.description: Verifies that the FoodProduct class defines 'getExpirationDate()' and 'setExpirationDate(...)' methods and references 'expirationDate', confirming the presence of proper accessor and mutator methods.
